title: First report of components responsible for odor sensation from a vertical flow constructed wetland treating combined sewer overflow
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00303A, Communication
Ismael Vera-Puerto, Shrabana Sarkar, Gianfranco Moris, Hugo Valdes, Marco Quiroz, Juan LÃ³pez, Francisco Encina, Pascal Molle, Carlos A. Arias
The present study represents the first attempt to demonstrate the online monitoring of components responsible for odor sensation from a constructed wetland (CW) utilized in treating combined sewer overflow (CSO)....
